chants.title: Baye Fall Chant unplugged
chants.content: This is a recording of Baye Fall chanting recorded in Diourbel, Senegal on July 22, 2011. The Baye Falls are a sub-sect of the Mouride Islamic Brotherhood. This was recorded outside the compound of a Peace Corps Volunteer serving in Senegal.

chants.title: 24 Topographie sonore du quartier : chant du petit cossyphe
chants.content: Recording of the atmosphere in the Nkolmbong-Nord neighborhood, Émana, Yaoundé 1, Cameroon. November 5, 2024, 6:14 a.m. Sounds captured: song of a Snowy-crowned Robin-Chat amid human activity. This bird is normally quite rare in urban areas . Equipment: iPhone 7. Average quality.

metadata.title: 24 Topographie sonore du quartier : chant du petit cossyphe
metadata.content: Recording of the atmosphere in the Nkolmbong-Nord neighborhood, Émana, Yaoundé 1, Cameroon. November 5, 2024, 6:14 a.m. Sounds captured: song of a Snowy-crowned Robin-Chat amid human activity. This bird is normally quite rare in urban areas . Equipment: iPhone 7. Average quality.

danses.title: West African Dance at the White House, 2007Apr25.jpg

danses.title: Haya traditional dance in Tanzania.webm
danses.content: The video has recorded with the Swahili message to young people emphasizing them to love and perform their culture specifically the traditional dances in respect to Tanzanian Haya tribe's traditional dance (ngoma) done at the University of Dodoma in Tanzania.
